Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 03:02AM Cfarnell wrote: Great tip on the bras kaywrite! Glad to see you there as well. I’m now 5 treatments in. Some burn is starting to happen on underarm near back. No pain. Greasing up with the Aquaphor. Saw rad doc today also. She said to keep exercising and stay hydrated to avoid fatigue. I’ve been catching the yoga classes at ymca and it’s helped with coping for sure. A shout out to Marie Curie for devoting her life to the study of radiation! Benefitting from her research with this therapy Hang in there everyone! Stay positive.
